title: CompareSurfaces
description: Calculates distance at each node in Surface 1 (S1) to Surface 2 (S2) along the local surface normal at each node in S1. Superseded by SurfToSurf.

hemisphere.title: Hemisphere
hemisphere.description: Specify the hemisphere being processed (left or right).

volume_parent_1.title: Volume Parent 1
volume_parent_1.description: Volume parent BRIK for first surface.

volume_parent_2.title: Volume Parent 2
volume_parent_2.description: Volume parent BRIK for second surface.

file_prefix.title: File prefix
file_prefix.description: Prefix for distance and node color output files. Existing file will not be overwritten.

one_node.title: One node
one_node.description: Output results for node index only. This option is for debugging.

node_range.title: Node range
node_range.description: Output results from node istart to node istop only. This option is for debugging.

no_consistency_check.title: No consistency check
no_consistency_check.description: Skip mesh orientation consistency check. This speeds up the start time so it is useful for debugging runs.

no_volreg.title: No volume registration
no_volreg.description: Ignore any Rotate, Volreg, Tagalign, or WarpDrive transformations present in the Surface Volume.

set_environment_variable.title: Set environment variable
set_environment_variable.description: Set environment variable ENVname to be ENVvalue. Quotes are necessary.

trace.title: Trace
trace.description: Turns on In/Out debug and Memory tracing.
